issue.title: Sweep: Refactor Navbar to class component
issue.body:
* In src/components/Navbar.tsx, define a class Navbar that extends React.Component. * In src/components/Navbar.tsx, implement a render method that returns the same JSX as the functional component. * In src/components/Navbar.tsx, replace the use of useBreakpointValue with this.state and this.setState. * In src/components/Navbar.tsx, write unit tests for the refactored component and run them to verify that they pass. Parent issue: #335
Checklist - [X] `src/components/Navbar.tsx` ✅ Commit [`5a6ece2`](https://github.com/sweepai/landing-page/commit/5a6ece28c5179116093901e3721a26d0271b837f)
• Define a class Navbar that extends React.Component. • Implement a constructor that initializes the state with the properties listDisplay and menuDisplay. • Replace the use of useBreakpointValue with this.state and this.setState in the render method. • Implement a render method that returns the same JSX as the functional component.

• Import the Navbar component. • Write a unit test that renders the Navbar component and verifies that it renders correctly. • Write a unit test that simulates a change in the window size and verifies that the state of the Navbar component updates correctly.
